channels: Here are all the channels I've found

channels.sql: SELECT '1', name, '/' || :site_address || '/channels/' || REPLACE(directory, 'data/users/', '') || '/' || channel_id || '/' FROM channels LEFT JOIN json USING (json_id) ORDER BY date_added ASC

channels/:auth_address.sql: SELECT '1', name, '/' || :site_address || 'channels/' || :auth_address || '/' || channel_id || '/' FROM channels LEFT JOIN json USING (json_id) WHERE directory=('data/users/' || :auth_address)

SELECT '9', title, '/' || site || '/' || REPLACE(video_file, 'merged-KxoVid/' || site || '/', '') FROM videos LEFT JOIN json USING (json_id) WHERE directory=('data/users/' || :auth_address) ORDER BY date_added DESC

channels/:auth_address/:id.sql: SELECT 'i', name FROM channels LEFT JOIN json USING (json_id) WHERE directory=('data/users/' || :auth_address) and channel_id = :id

SELECT '9', title, '/' || site || '/' || REPLACE(video_file, 'merged-KxoVid/' || site || '/', '') FROM videos LEFT JOIN json USING (json_id) WHERE directory=('data/users/' || :auth_address) AND ref_channel_id=:id ORDER BY date_added DESC
